content.title: # Received Events
# Risk Indicator Summary Received

content.query:
let indicatorEventDetailsCount = CitrixAnalytics_indicatorEventDetails_CL | count; 
print toscalar(indicatorEventDetailsCount);
content.title: # Risk Indicator Event Details Received

content.query:
let riskScoreChangeCount = CitrixAnalytics_riskScoreChange_CL | count ;
print toscalar(riskScoreChangeCount);
content.title: # Risk Score Changes Received
# User Profile Risk Score Received
# User Profile Location Received
# User Profile App Received
# User Profile Usage Received
# User Profile Device Received

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL | project bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), event_type_s
| union CitrixAnalytics_indicatorEventDetails_CL | project bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), event_type_s
| union CitrixAnalytics_riskScoreChange_CL | project bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), event_type_s
| union CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL | project bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), event_type_s
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), event_type_s
content.title: Citrix Analytics Events Received (over time)

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL
| where data_source_s == "{dataSource}"
| where indicator_category_s == "{riskIndicatorCategory}"
| where entity_type_s == "{entityType}"
| where indicator_type_s == "{riskIndicatorType}"
| where indicator_name_s == "{riskIndicator}"
| project TimeGenerated, data_source_s, indicator_category_s, indicator_name_s, entity_id_s, entity_type_s, severity_s, risk_probability_s, indicator_uuid_g
content.title: Risk Indicator (History)

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorEventDetails_CL
| where indicator_uuid_g == '{indicator_uuid_g}'
content.title: Risk Indicator Event Details

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where cur_riskscore_d > 64
| where cur_riskscore_d < 100
| where entity_type_s == 'user'
| summarize count()
content.title: High Risk Users

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where cur_riskscore_d > 34
| where cur_riskscore_d < 63
| where entity_type_s == 'user'
| summarize count()
content.title: Medium Risk Users

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where cur_riskscore_d > 1
| where cur_riskscore_d < 33
| where entity_type_s == 'user'
| summarize count()
content.title: Low Risk Users

content.query:
( CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where cur_riskscore_d > 64
| where cur_riskscore_d < 100
| where entity_type_s == 'user'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1d), severity="High")
| union (CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where cur_riskscore_d > 34
| where cur_riskscore_d < 63
| where entity_type_s == 'user'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1d), severity="Medium")
| union (CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where cur_riskscore_d > 1
| where cur_riskscore_d < 33
| where entity_type_s == 'user'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1d), severity="Low")
| order by severity, TimeGenerated asc 
| render barchart
content.title: Users Risk Profile (over time)

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| join CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL on tenant_id_s, entity_id_s
| summarize count() by entity_id_s, indicator_category_s, cur_riskscore_d
| evaluate pivot(indicator_category_s)
| where entity_id_s contains "{userName}"
content.title: Risky Users

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL
| where indicator_type_s == "{riskIndicatorType}"
| where entity_type_s == "{entityType}"
| summarize count() by TimeGenerated, indicator_name_s
content.title: Risk Indicators Received

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL
| where indicator_type_s == "{riskIndicatorType}"
| where entity_type_s == "{entityType}"
| summarize Count = count() by indicator_name_s
| top 10 by Count desc
content.title: Top 10 Risk Indicators

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorEventDetails_CL
| join CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL on indicator_uuid_g
| where indicator_type_s == "{riskIndicatorType}"
| where entity_type_s == "{entityType}"
| where country_s != "NA"
| summarize count() by city_s, country_s
content.title: Citrix Analytics Risk Indicator by Geo Location

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_riskScoreChange_CL
| where entity_id_s contains "{userName}"
| order by TimeGenerated desc 
| project cur_riskscore_d
| limit 1
content.title: Current Risk Score

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_riskScoreChange_CL
| where entity_id_s contains "{userName}"
| summarize by cur_riskscore_d, TimeGenerated

CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL
| where entity_id_s contains "{userName}"
| summarize count() by indicator_name_s
content.title: Risk Indicator (ratio)

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorEventDetails_CL
| where entity_id_s contains "{userName}"
| where country_s != "NA"
| project country_s
content.title: Risk Indicator (Geo Distribution)

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| join CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL on tenant_id_s, entity_id_s
| where entity_id_s contains "{userName}"
| where event_type_s == "userProfileDevice"
| project data_source_s, indicator_category_s, indicator_name_s, device_s
content.title: Related Devices

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_indicatorSummary_CL
| join CitrixAnalytics_indicatorEventDetails_CL on tenant_id_s, entity_id_s
| where entity_id_s contains "{userName}"
| project data_source_s, indicator_category_s, indicator_name_s, client_ip_s
content.title: Related IP's

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileApp"
| summarize sum(cnt_d) by app_s
| take 10
| order by sum_cnt_d desc
content.title: Top 10 User Applications

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileDevice"
| summarize sum(cnt_d) by device_s
| take 10
| order by sum_cnt_d desc
content.title: Top 10 User Devices

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileLocation"
| summarize sum(cnt_d) by city_s, country_s
| take 10
| order by sum_cnt_d desc
content.title: Top 10 User Locations

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileUsage"
| summarize sum(uploaded_file_cnt_d)
content.title: Files Uploaded

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileUsage"
| summarize sum(downloaded_file_cnt_d)
content.title: Files Downloaded

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileUsage"
| summarize sum(shared_file_cnt_d)
content.title: Files Shared

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileUsage"
| summarize sum(deleted_file_cnt_d)
content.title: Files Deleted

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileUsage"
| summarize sum(downloaded_bytes_d)/1000000000
content.title: Data Downloaded (in GB)

content.query:
CitrixAnalytics_userProfile_CL
| where event_type_s == "userProfileUsage"
| summarize sum(uploaded_bytes_d)/1000000000
content.title: Data Uploaded (in GB)

items.name: Content Collaboration Data Usage Details Group
